definitions.she2: to break (e.g. stick or bone); a loss;
definitions.zhe1: to turn sth over; to turn upside down; to tip sth out (of a container);
definitions.zhe2: to break; to fracture; to snap; to suffer loss; to bend; to twist; to turn; to change direction; convinced; to convert into (currency); discount; rebate; tenth (in price); classifier for theatrical scenes; to fold; accounts book; variant of 折[zhe2]; to fold;
